title: Building Server-Side Application with Node.js
blog_text: Write your own server-side applications to handle requests and ultimately to build your own APIs using Node.js

title: Express framework for Node.js
blog_text: Express.js is a widely used Node.js framework, to handle different HTTP methods in an API route.

title: MySql for Full-Stack Developers
blog_text: Storing and retrieving data quickly and efficiently makes MySql databases the foundation of full-stack web applications.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
blog_text: Object-relational mapping (ORM) makes tasks more manageable by helping us to interact with databases using JavaScript.

title: Model-View-Controller (MVC)
blog_text: MVC is an architectural pattern that structures a codebase in three distinct sections, according to a software design philosophy known as the separation of concerns.
